attributes.action: To change the Law back to how it was by allowing 16 year olds to buy tobacco products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Raising the age of smoking isn't going to anything. Infact, its going to get more "badmen" taking up the habit, as if they see it illegal, then they will do it. That is why i am saying lower the age. People would just look upon it and say its just stupid. People know the risk but people only do it because they think they are "cool" (based upon the teenager side). The more legal it is the less people are going to do it

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
